title: Pfizer’s Promising Early Vaccine Data
itunes:title: Pfizer’s Promising Early Vaccine Data
description:
Dr. Josh Sharfstein, Vice Dean for Public Health Practice and Community Engagement at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses coronavirus cases on the rise in the U.S. and Pfizer’s Covid vaccine news. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy talk about the story “Bidenomics: Middle-Class Joe Restores Normalcy to the Economy.” Bloomberg News Politics Editor Wendy Benjaminson talks about why Obama-era alumni are favorites for Biden’s top economic posts. And we Drive to the Close with Abhay Deshpande, Founder and CIO at Centerstone Investors.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
